content: Hi, I'm having trouble with my order. The tracking number is #123456 and the expected delivery date was March 15th.
Thank you for reaching out to us. Can you please confirm your shipping address so we can look into this further?
My shipping address is 123 Main St, Anytown, USA 12345.
We apologize for the delay in delivery. We'll do our best to expedite your order and get it to you as soon as possible.
Can you also let me know if there's anything I can do to help with the delay?
We appreciate your patience and cooperation. In the meantime, we'll keep you updated on the status of your order.
